name: House is not always a home (LD49:Unstable)
name_original: House is not always a home (LD49:Unstable)
description:
Short visual novel created for Ludum Dare 49 under the theme "unstable".

This was a story that ive been wanting to write for a while, and once "unstable" was announced as a theme i decided to use this as my spin on the theme.

this game contains subject matters such as abuse and sexual assault, so please, if these topics are sensitive to you, consider skipping over this game.

PC download is ALSO the source code, it contains everything from the audio to photos to the script!
